title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.11 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.11 - Severability

State Regulations
(a) If any
provision of this Part or the application thereof to any person or circumstance
is adjudged invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, such judgment shall
not affect or impair the validity of the other provisions of this Part or the
application thereof to other persons and circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
604.11

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
